Inheritance diagram for CSettingsStorageMSXMLFile:

Detailed Description

CSettingsStorage implementation for XML files using MSXML.

Member Function Documentation

void CSettingsStorageMSXMLFile::SetXMLFileName (  LPCTSTR  FileName,
LPCTSTR  RootElementName
)  [inline]
 

Defines the XML Filename related to this storage object.

Call it before any calls to CSettings::Load() or CSettings::Save().

Parameters:
FileName The XML file pathname.
RootElementName The name for the root element.
